rx.description: The network target, <udp:ip_address:port>, where the call's incoming RTP media packets should be forwarded.

stream_type.description: Optionally specify a media type to stream. If `decrypted` selected, Telnyx will decrypt incoming SIP media before forking to the target. `rx` and `tx` are required fields if `decrypted` selected.

tx.description: The network target, <udp:ip_address:port>, where the call's outgoing RTP media packets should be forwarded.

client_state.description: Use this field to add state to every subsequent webhook. It must be a valid Base-64 encoded string.

command_id.description: Use this field to avoid duplicate commands. Telnyx will ignore any command with the same `command_id` for the same `call_control_id`.
